title: jeremypwr
author: jeremypwr
content: Please note that this Football Prediction Contest is exclusively for participants of hilarious' Premier League pool @ https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5405399.0Southampton + Arsenal + São Paulo FC Friday + Sunday Football Prediction Contest!Game 1:  Southampton v Aston Villa  (Friday)https://sportsbet.io/sports/event/soccer/england/premier-league/aston-villa-v-southampton-fc-63144ea87e93ee10b96c4cf3Game 2:  Arsenal v Brentford  (Sunday)https://sportsbet.io/sports/event/soccer/england/premier-league/brentford-fc-v-arsenal-fc-63144fdad5ab6359543f0677Game 3:  São Paulo FC v Ceará  (Sunday)https://sportsbet.io/sports/event/soccer/brazil/brasileiro-serie-a/ceara-sc-ce-v-sao-paulo-fc-sp-631e419b20f64277acc4583fRulesa)  Predict the minute of the 1st Goal Scored (doesn't matter which team scores)This Prediction will be for all 3 gamesb)  Predict the Exact Final Score with winnerExampleGame 1:  20'  2-0 SouthamptonGame 2:  20'  2-0 ArsenalGame 3:  20'  1-0 São Paulo FCPrizesThe closest 1st Goal Scored prediction wins a 1 mbtc Free Bet!If you correctly predict the exact time of the 1st Goal Scored and successfully predict the Final Score, your Free Bet will be for 2 mbtc!(Small print) *The declared winners are final and up to my discretion*
